001import javax.swing.JFrame;
002import javax.swing.JTextField;
003import javax.swing.JTextArea;
004import javax.swing.JLabel;
005import javax.swing.ImageIcon;
006import javax.swing.JScrollPane;
007import javax.swing.JPanel;
008import javax.swing.JButton;
009
010import java.awt.Dimension;
011import java.awt.BorderLayout;
012
013import java.awt.event.ActionListener;
014import java.awt.event.WindowAdapter;
015import java.awt.event.WindowEvent;
016import java.awt.event.ActionEvent;
017
018import java.net.URL;
019
020
021/**
022 * This class implements a simple graphical user interface with a 
023 * text entry area, a text output area and an optional image.
024 * 
025 * @author Michael Kolling
026 * @version 1.0 (Jan 2003) DB edited (2023)
027 */
028public class UserInterface implements ActionListener
029{
030    private GameEngine aEngine;
031    private JFrame     aMyFrame;
032    private JTextField aEntryField;
033    private JTextArea  aLog;
034    private JLabel     aImage;
035    private JButton aButton;
036    private JButton aButton2;
037    
038    /**
039     * Construct a UserInterface. As a parameter, a Game Engine
040     * (an object processing and executing the game commands) is
041     * needed.
042     * 
043     * @param pGameEngine The GameEngine object implementing the game logic.
044     */
045    public UserInterface( final GameEngine pGameEngine )
046    {
047        this.aEngine = pGameEngine;
048        this.createGUI();
049    } // UserInterface(.)
050
051    /**
052     * Print out some text into the text area.
053     * @param pText chaine de caracteres
054     */
055    public void print( final String pText )
056    {
057        this.aLog.append( pText );
058        this.aLog.setCaretPosition( this.aLog.getDocument().getLength() );
059    } // print(.)
060
061    /**
062     * Print out some text into the text area, followed by a line break.
063     * @param pText texte écrit dans la fenêtre
064    */
065    public void println( final String pText )
066    {
067        this.print( pText + "\n" );
068    } // println(.)
069
070    /**
071     * Show an image file in the interface.
072     * @param pImageName nom de l'image
073     */
074    public void showImage( final String pImageName )
075    {
076        String vImagePath = "" + pImageName; // to change the directory
077        URL vImageURL = this.getClass().getClassLoader().getResource( vImagePath );
078        if ( vImageURL == null )
079            System.out.println( "Image not found : " + vImagePath );
080        else {
081            ImageIcon vIcon = new ImageIcon( vImageURL );
082            this.aImage.setIcon( vIcon );
083            this.aMyFrame.pack();
084        }
085    } // showImage(.)
086
087    /**
088     * Enable or disable input in the entry field.
089     * @param pOnOff booleen
090     */
091    public void enable( final boolean pOnOff )
092    {
093        this.aEntryField.setEditable( pOnOff ); // enable/disable
094        if ( pOnOff ) { // enable
095            this.aEntryField.getCaret().setBlinkRate( 500 ); // cursor blink
096            this.aEntryField.addActionListener( this ); // reacts to entry
097        }
098        else { // disable
099            this.aEntryField.getCaret().setBlinkRate( 0 ); // cursor won't blink
100            this.aEntryField.removeActionListener( this ); // won't react to entry
101        }
102    } // enable(.)
103
104    /**
105     * Set up graphical user interface.
106     */
107    private void createGUI()
108    {
109        this.aMyFrame = new JFrame( "3417." );
110        this.aEntryField = new JTextField( 34 );
111        this.aEntryField.enable(false);
112        
113        this.aLog = new JTextArea();
114        this.aLog.setEditable( false );
115        JScrollPane vListScroller = new JScrollPane( this.aLog );
116        vListScroller.setPreferredSize( new Dimension(200, 200) );
117        vListScroller.setMinimumSize( new Dimension(100,100) );
118        
119        this.aButton = new JButton("start!"); // bouton de départ
120        this.aButton2 = new JButton("quest");
121        
122        aMyFrame.add(this.aButton,BorderLayout.EAST); // positionné à droite de la fenêtre
123        
124        this.aImage = new JLabel();
125    
126        JPanel vPanel = new JPanel();
127        vPanel.setLayout( new BorderLayout() ); // ==> only five places
128        vPanel.add( this.aImage, BorderLayout.NORTH );
129        vPanel.add( vListScroller, BorderLayout.CENTER );
130        vPanel.add( this.aEntryField, BorderLayout.SOUTH );
131
132        this.aMyFrame.getContentPane().add( vPanel, BorderLayout.CENTER );
133
134        // add some event listeners to some components
135        this.aEntryField.addActionListener( this );
136        this.aButton.addActionListener(this);
137        this.aButton2.addActionListener(this);
138        
139        // to end program when window is closed
140        this.aMyFrame.addWindowListener(
141            new WindowAdapter() { // anonymous class
142                /** Ferme la fenêtre du jeu.
143                 * @param pE WindowEvent
144                 */
145                @Override public void windowClosing(final WindowEvent pE)
146                {
147                    System.exit(0);
148                }
149        } );
150
151        this.aMyFrame.pack();
152        this.aMyFrame.setVisible( true );
153        this.aEntryField.requestFocus();
154    } // createGUI()
155
156    /**
157     * Actionlistener interface for entry textfield.
158     * @param pE ActionEvent
159     */
160    @Override public void actionPerformed( final ActionEvent pE ) 
161    {
162        if(pE.getSource() == this.aButton){ // si le bouton est utilisé
163            aMyFrame.remove(this.aButton); // le bouton est retiré
164            aMyFrame.add(this.aButton2,BorderLayout.WEST);
165            this.aMyFrame.setVisible(false);// on réactualise la fenêtre
166            this.aMyFrame.pack();           
167            this.aMyFrame.setVisible(true);
168            
169            // et le texte start considéré comme commande est automatiquement entrée dans l'Entry Field
170
171            this.aEntryField.enable(true); // l'EntryField est ensuite activée pour être utilisable par l'utilisateur
172            this.aEntryField.setText( "look" );
173            this.aMyFrame.setVisible( true ); // on réactualise la fenêtre
174        }
175        if(pE.getSource() == this.aButton2){
176            this.aEntryField.setText( "quest" );
177        }
178        // because there is only one possible action (text input) :
179        this.processCommand(); // never suppress this line
180    } // actionPerformed(.)
181
182    /**
183     * A command has been entered in the entry field.  
184     * Read the command and do whatever is necessary to process it.
185     */
186    private void processCommand()
187    {
188        String vInput = this.aEntryField.getText();
189        this.aEntryField.setText( "" );
190        
191        this.aEngine.interpretCommand( vInput );
192    } // processCommand()
193} // UserInterface
